job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description:
Junior Software Engineer (Front End)
GavinHeath is partnering with a client who is looking to hire a Junior Software Engineer on a 100% remote basis. This is a direct hire position.
This role could be a great fit for you if
:
You have developed React-based web applications used by multiple users in a production environment, or...
You have developed web applications using another JavaScript framework used by multiple users in a production environment and have experience on a software development team, or...
You can provide multiple examples of non-production web applications you have developed and have formal education in front-end development and have experience on a software development team
Responsibilities
Play a key role on a small, highly productive team of experienced developers
Develop high quality product features that get used, every day
Produce high quality code through thoughtful design, diligent execution and good test coverage
Provide well-structured code for review by team members and engage in thoughtful and critical discussions
Contribute ideas to the team and the company as a whole to improve how we work
Qualifications
Formal computer science or software engineering education or equivalent knowledge and skills gained through multi-year, professional experience
Demonstrable examples of modern web application components you have developed
Strong software development fundamentals and problem-solving skills
An understanding of user interface software design
Experience using modern web application development tools and technologies
A passion for learning and education
A desire to go above and beyond to do what is right for our customers
Intellectual curiosity and a willingness to learn and share with others you work with
A high standard of excellence in the work you do
Good communication skills and cognitive empathy
